application.doc: Deleting the trace file and all rollover files for a component

param.name: id
param.doc: Name of the instance to act on, which is a unique name that identifies the instance

param.name: component_id
param.doc: ID of the tracing component to be updated. This value should be URL encoded.

method.name: DELETE
method.id: Deleting a trace and all rollover files - Reverse Proxy Server
method.doc: To delete the trace file and rollover files for a component with the web service, issue an HTTP DELETE command on the Reverse Proxy tracing files resource URI. The trace file and rollover file to be deleted should not be in use at the time of deletion.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

response.doc:
200 ok
Note: A trace file can be deleted only when it is not actively being used. This operation only deletes the files that are not in use.
There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
